title: Examining The Supply Chain, Markets, And ETFs
itunes:title: Examining The Supply Chain, Markets, And ETFs
description:
Greg Hewitt, Chief Executive Officer of DHL Express USA, talks about supply chain bottlenecks and how it affects the economy. Kurt Sievers, President and CEO of NXP Semiconductors, discusses the supply chain as it relates to the automotive industry, as well as semiconductor manufacturing. Anders Persson, the Chief Investment Officer of Global Fixed Income at Nuveen, talks about the economy and markets. Frank Holmes, CEO and CIO of U.S. Global Investors, discusses jet ETFs and travel outlook for 2022. Hosted by Matt Miller and Taylor Riggs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
